title: Amount of snowdown shop deals?
body:
Hey guys, 

Screenshot of my smurfs snowdown shop, only offered 5 deals. It's not related to level since my friend whom is a few levels lower has a full 6 deals; as does my main account.

All the screenshots and discussion i've seen has had 6 deals, so i'm not sure what's going on and can't seem to find anything about it.

Anyone have any information? Thank you. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Hey Seconddayplaying, 

This could be related to the Challenger Ahri issue. You may want to submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support so they can look into this further.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=trJiFeo6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-17T07:31:42.255+0000)
>
> Hey Seconddayplaying, 
> 
> This could be related to the Challenger Ahri issue. You may want to submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support so they can look into this further.

Thanks! I did a short while ago. you could be right.
